title: The Munchers: a fable
brief_description: Animated clay figures representing teeth, plaque, bacteria, dental floss and the toothbrush present information on nutrition and dental health. The proper type of foods for optimum oral health is also discussed.
description: Animated clay figures representing teeth, plaque, bacteria, dental floss and the toothbrush present information on nutrition and dental health. The proper type of foods for optimum oral health is also discussed.
